BonusDescriptions.Full: Targets suffer reduced Movement, Accuracy and Heat Management

Machine Guns are large caliber rapid-fire weapons
Gauss Rifles are low-Heat long-range high-Damage ballistic weapons
AP Gauss Rifles fire a barrage of {0} smaller projectiles
Autocannons are single-shot ballistic weapons that suffer from Recoil
